definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)

pinyin: Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 shan1 mai4

definition: Andes mountain chain of South America
Qinling mountain range in Shaanxi forming natural barrier between Guanzhong plain 關中平原|关中平原 and Han River 汉水 valley
Karakorum mountain range in west Xinjiang
pinyin: Ka1 la3 kun1 lun2 Shan1 mai4

definition: Qilian Mountains (formerly Richthofen Range), dividing Qinghai and Gansu provinces
Qionglai mountains on the boundary of the Sichuan basin 四川盆地
Carpathian Mountains, 1500-km mountain range in Central and Eastern Europe
pinyin: Ka1 er3 ba1 qian1 Shan1 mai4

definition: Helan Mountains, lying across part of the border between Ningxia and Inner Mongolia
Altai mountain chain on the border of Russia and Mongolia

pinyin: Za1 ge2 luo2 si1 shan1 mai4

definition: Daxing'anling mountain range in northwest Heilongjiang province
pinyin: Da4 xing1 an1 ling3 shan1 mai4

sentences.english: The mountain range has much high peaks and deep canyons. The scenery is very lovely.
sentences.chinese: 这条山脉有很多岑岭和幽谷，得意美极了。

sentences.english: The coastal desert occupies a long strip between the Pacific Ocean and the Andes Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 海岸荒漠占领长条状的之间的太平洋和安第斯山脉。

sentences.english: The mountain ridges in this area twist and twine, stretching endlessly.
sentences.chinese: 这个山区的山脉蜿蜒曲折，连绵不绝。

sentences.english: A high mountain range, the Trans–Antarctic range, runs from east to west, cutting the continent in two.
sentences.chinese: 一条横贯南极洲的山脉，从东到西将南极洲分为两半。

sentences.english: The Rocky Mountains have rugged mountains and roads.
sentences.chinese: 落基山脉有崇山峻岭和崎岖不平的道路。

sentences.english: The Andes are the longest system of high mountain ranges on earth.
sentences.chinese: 安地斯山是世界上最长的山脉上的系统。

sentences.english: The Donner party finally made it through the Wasatch Mountains and arrived at the Great Salt Lake.
sentences.chinese: 唐纳之队最终穿越了瓦扎茨山脉，到达了大盐湖。
喜马拉雅山脉农家，卡林，不丹，1989。

sentences.english: Among the endless icy mountains is Ilum's Crystal Cave.
sentences.chinese: 在无边无际的冰封山脉中有伊冷的水晶洞。

sentences.english: The climber traversed a long horizontal crack in the face of the mountain slope.
sentences.chinese: 登山者横贯了山脉斜坡表面一段长的水平裂缝。

sentences.english: The Cascades are made up of lavas and volcanic materials.
sentences.chinese: Cascade山脉是由熔岩以及火山物组成的。
2004年的木瓜溪河床和中央山脉。

sentences.english: Farther east stand the Velvet Hills, whence we are bound.
sentences.chinese: 再远的东边屹立着天鹅绒山脉，那里是我们的边界了。

sentences.english: I was born in Burdine, Kentucky, in the heart of the Appalachian coal-mining country.
sentences.chinese: 我出生在阿帕拉契山脉煤矿区中心的肯塔基州柏定市。

sentences.english: Vicky cycled alone through the Rocky Mountains down to the western United States.
sentences.chinese: 姬莹一人骑车穿过洛基山脉抵达美国西部。

sentences.english: Feng dance main, arrive megalith mountain scope, do you then want to quit?
sentences.chinese: 凤舞法师，到达巨石山脉，你便要离开吗？

definition: great valley/Grand Canyon of Colorado River
Hengduan mountains, several parallel mountain ranges on the border between west Yunnan and Sichuan and east Tibet
